constraints.name: range_bound
constraints.description: 每个会议的参会者范围在给定区间内（L_j ≤ x ≤ R_j）

constraints.name: sum_constraint
constraints.description: 会议的成本等于其所有参会者的成本之和
constraints.formal: C_j = Σ (max(H_x, H_{x+1}, ..., H_y)) for all y in [L_j, R_j]

constraints.name: distinctness
constraints.description: 每个会议的参会者范围是唯一的，即没有两个会议有相同的 (L_j, R_j) 对
constraints.formal: (L_j, R_j) ≠ (L_k, R_k) for all 0 ≤ j < k ≤ Q-1
